comments: Primes p such that p divides 3^(p-1)/2 + 1. - _Cino Hilliard_, Sep 04 2004Primes p such that 1+4*x+x^2 is irreducible over GF(p). [Joerg Arndt, Aug 10 2011]Conjecture: Primes congruent to (5, 7) mod 12. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 06 2012
references: H. Hasse, Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, NY, 1980, p. 498.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = local( cnt, m ); if( n<1, return( 0 )); while( cnt < n, if( isprime( m++) && kronecker( 12, m )== -1, cnt++ )); m} /* _Michael Somos_, Aug 14 2012 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_
